title: How to Make a Jack in the Box Oreo Cookie Shake

steps.headline: Pour in the milk and ice cream into a blender.
steps.description: You may also add some ice as well.

steps.headline: Turn the blender onto a low speed.
steps.description: Blend until the mixture is smooth. Mix with a spoon to fold in anything that wasn't blended enough, then continue blending the mixture.

steps.headline: Take each Oreo and crush them as you add them to the blender.
Turn the blender back onto a low speed.
steps.description: Blend everything together; you'll want either the cookies to be pureed or for about 10 seconds in total.

text: Pour in the milk and ice cream into a blender. You may also add some ice as well. Turn the blender onto a low speed. Blend until the mixture is smooth. Mix with a spoon to fold in anything that wasn't blended enough, then continue blending the mixture. Take each Oreo and crush them as you add them to the blender.  Turn the blender back onto a low speed. Blend everything together; you'll want either the cookies to be pureed or for about 10 seconds in total. Pour in glasses.
